SKU628628.Name: Tropez Black and White Stripe Sofa
SKU628628.Description: oh la la. If we went to a fancy resort in the French Riviera, this is what we want in our cabana. A modern interpretation of classic Cote D'Azur by designer Ceci Thompson. Crafted of natural mahogany—a rich, warm wood that stands up to the elements year after year—this classic slatted silhouette is both elegant and airy. Contrasting black and white stripe cushion in weather-resistant polyester adds a touch of glamour to any outdoor decor. Best of all, cushion cover zips right off for easy cleaning. Learn about Ceci Thompson on our blog. tropez black and white stripe sofa is a CB2 exclusive.

Dimentions.productName: Tropez Black and White Stripe Sofa

Cushions: Polyester in black and white stripe

SKU289951.Name: Matera Large Grey Outdoor Dining Table
SKU289951.Description: designer picnic. Jonas Wahlström's outdoor table is a minimalist feast for the design eye. Crafted in solid acacia wood, long planks are detailed at the corners with legs precisely notched and integrated flush into the top. Will weather to a silvery-grey patina if left unprotected. Learn about Jonas Wahlström on our blog.

Dimentions.productName: Matera Large Grey Outdoor Dining Table

SKU591035.Description: modern bistro. The café chair spiffs up in clean new lines and sophisticated new color. Wide uni-slat back and generous seat with comfy waterfall at the knee shape up in modern matte black, top to bottom. Sturdy tubular iron frames stack out of the way when not in use. lucinda black stacking chair is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Outdoor-safe; cover or store indoors during inclement weather and when not in use

SKU427978.Name: Pod Hanging Chair with Cushion
SKU427978.Description: mod pod. Hang out and hide out on the patio in this breezy, handwoven seat. Faux wicker pod suspends a cozy, sheltering perch that stands up to the elements. In a time-intensive process that takes two artisans seven days to complete, off-white recyclable resin is handwoven on a powdercoated aluminum frame. Tufted cushion in weather-resistant taupe polyester tucks right in for a comfy spot to nest.
Features: Cushion is 100% polyester with poly fiber fill

SKU404669.Name: Pod Hanging Chair
SKU404669.Description: mod pod. Hang out and hide out on the patio in this breezy, handwoven seat. Faux wicker pod suspends a cozy, sheltering perch that stands up to the elements. In a time-intensive process that takes two artisans seven days to complete, off-white recyclable resin is handwoven on a powdercoated aluminum frame. Optional tufted cushion in weather-resistant taupe polyester tucks right in for a comfy spot to nest.

SKU218108.Name: Terrazzo Side Table
SKU218108.Description: Terrazzo stone shapes up as the perfect host for books, mags and snacks. Chic cylinder side table brings natural beauty and modern form to any outdoor seating area. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Terrazzo stone; each will be unique
Clean with a soft, damp cloth
Avoid placing hot or wet items on surface; coasters recommended
Outdoor-safe; cover or store indoors during inclement weather or when not in use

SKU218113.Name: Terrazzo Coffee Table
SKU218113.Description: Terrazzo stone shapes up as the perfect host for books, mags and snacks. Oversized coffee table rounds out large seating areas with natural beauty and modern form. CB2 exclusive.

SKU226266.Name: Lilly 3-Piece Nesting Table Set
SKU226266.Description: Three cast aluminum tables nestle in or drift out to create an organic resting place for drinks, books and greens. Each piece surfaces its own unique finishes and patterns, all done by hand. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Aluminum casted with brass patina finish
Clean with a soft, dry cloth; no abrasive cleaners
Outdoor-safe; cover or store indoors during inclement weather or when not in use

SKU510330.Name: Portal Side Table
SKU510330.Description: Outer space. Black and white resin swirl and meld around an open void to create this modern marbled side table. Universal shape with unexpected details bring cosmic vibes to any modern space. Float one as a side table or join two or more to create a larger surface. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Marbling varies per piece as each is hand done
Dust with a dry, clean cloth
Cover or store indoors during inclement weather and when not in use

SKU271224.Name: Polyterrazzo Oil Lamps
SKU271224.Description: glow show. Saucer radiates a soft glow in faux stone for a modern take on midcentury terrazzo. Burns the midnight mineral or citronella oil for up to eight hours. Center canister removes for easy refills. (Oil not included.) polyterrazzo oil lamps is a CB2 exclusive.

SKU524693.Name: Urli Firepit
SKU524693.Description: Cover story. Flying embers no more. Deep solid iron round steps up on round pedestal base in all black. Firepit takes cover under mesh top with center handle, complete with a hook-shaped tool to remove it when stoking and adding logs. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Use on fireproof, outdoor surfaces only
Strictly for woodburning; not intended for use as a grill or for food prep
Cover during rain or inclement weather (after fire pit has completely cooled)

SKU216873.Name: Concrete Hanging Planter
SKU216873.Description: Urban materials cement the perfect place for drapey greens to hang. Half-circle wall planter is surprisingly lightweight and expectedly durable. At home outdoors. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Two holes for hanging; hardware not included

SKU526971.Name: Seminyak Taupe Planters
SKU526971.Description: Urban oasis. Raw material of the city cements foundation for lush growth. Planter brings industrial vibes to the balcony/patio/porch. Works indoors too, thrives in multiples. CB2 exclusive.

SKU220907.Name: Seminyak Grey Planters
SKU220907.Description: Raw material of the city cements foundation for lush growth. Grey planter brings strong industrial vibes to the balcony/patio/porch. Works indoors too, thrives in multiples. CB2 exclusive.

SKU528077.Name: Playa Grey Planters
SKU528077.Description: Sand stone. Poly resin and stone mix to create the hi/low tones and textures of this sandy grey planter. Low-rise base lays the groundwork for an open planter, lush with possibilities. Natural home for tropical flowers, greens and cacti. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Wipe with a soft, dry cloth

SKU271517.Name: Zen Planters
SKU271517.Description: line drawing. Graphic thumbprint design ups the modern appeal on this glossy clay planter. Large scale vessel pairs perfectly with our Zen white planter for a classic black and white vibe. zen planters is a CB2 exclusive.

SKU615214.Name: Shore Polyterrazzo Planters
SKU615214.Description: stone clone. Modern faux-stone planter is handmade from an innovative polystone material that resembles natural limestone—both in looks and durability. Modern conical shape and natural finish blend nicely with any decor. We especially love them in multiples. shore polyterrazzo planters is a CB2 exclusive.

SKU614914.Description: urban landscape. Charcoal planter squares up sleek and modern. Protected for indoor and outdoor settings, matte-finished galvanized steel plays up refined industrial to dramatic effect. blox tall galvanized charcoal planters is a CB2 exclusive.

SKU403803.Name: Kronos Planters
SKU403803.Description: low-rise garden. Industrial planter gives rise to greens in matte carbon powdercoat. Nested within sculptural iron frame, galvanized steel boxes remove for easy planting and watering. Arrange together to create a hi/lo effect, indoors or out. kronos planters is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Galvanized steel and iron with matte carbon powdercoat finish
Planter insert removes for easy planting and watering

SKU543858.Name: Playa Terrazzo Balls
SKU543858.Description: Garden globe. Poly resin and stone mix to create the speckled tones and textures of this garden sphere. Chic alone, extra fun in multiples. CB2 exclusive.

SKU535031.Name: Hayes Tall Vase
SKU535031.Description: Fresh display. Oversized decorative vase arranges long stems upright to bring height to the table. Finished in crackled white lacquer, clay is hand-rolled and applied in a mini-bubble technique that makes us swoon. CB2 exclusive.

SKU593376.Name: Bongo Side Tables
SKU593376.Description: art form. An aggregate of marble, granite, stone and natural fibers cement this handmade table into an organic outdoor sculpture. Maintain table's honed beauty and natural intonations with car wax or stone floor polish. bongo side tables is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Handcrafted from stone composite and natural fibers
Color may fade over time, rewax to darken
Cover or store indoors during inclement weather

SKU412024.Name: Pod Hanging Chair Cushion
SKU412024.Description: tuft love. Hang out and hide out on the patio. Designed to nest in our pod hanging chair, this buttonless tufted cushion stands up to the elements in weather-resistant taupe polyester. Tucks right in to create a comfy perch.

SKU280601.Name: Braided Jute Floor Cushion
SKU280601.Description: on the ropes. Oversized square fills out the room in coiled braids of natural jute. Dense poly-fill makes the cushion sturdy for extra seating. Or, stack two and top with a tray for when guests pop in.
Features: Store indoors during winter or inclement weather

SKU605986.Name: Criss Knit Black Pouf
SKU605986.Description: black out. Super-sized round hits the deck in outdoor-friendly materials that can stand up (or sit down) to the elements. Chunky cross-stitch ropes in the sides, tight concentric weave rounds out the top—all in black poly/foam knit that's easy to wipe clean. Dense polyfil makes it sturdy for seat/ottoman duty, or table it with a tray on top. criss knit black pouf is a CB2 exclusive.

SKU604640.Name: Saic Watering Carafe
SKU604640.Description: twice as nice. SAIC watering carafe was created exclusively for Design Collab. This CB2 collaborative, now in its second year, brings together like-minded souls and design institutions. Design Collab No. 2 asked 12 students in the Designed Objects curriculum at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago (SAIC), "What does 'live well' mean in the context of home design?" Student Mathew Devendorf liked the idea of one object serving many functions. Take this watering carafe/objet d'art. Handmade stoneware transforms a utilitarian vessel into a modern sculpture. Dipped in a modern matte white glaze, silhouette sits pretty in the windowsill ready to give your plants a welcome drink.Head to Idea Central to learn about the designer's inspiration for this product and our SAIC collaboration.
Features: Designed exclusively for CB2 by SAIC student Mathew Devendorf as part of Design Collab No. 2

SKU173648.Name: Brass Watering Can
SKU173648.Description: art in use. We love beautiful, practical things. Stunning in silhouette, handmade vessel shines bright in brass-plated stainless steel. Water your plants and don't bother to put it away. Too lovely to hide. brass watering can is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Stainless steel with shiny brass finish
Wipe with a soft, dry cloth

SKU261646.Name: Doris Aluminum Barware
SKU261646.Description: Throwback. Popular in the '50s and '60s, metallic tumblers are back with an updated shape and modern palette. Metallic glasses add shine to the table inside or out. We especially love them for outdoor entertaining. CB2 exclusive.
